message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  We can start off strong and maybe even get more in the future.
I'll take a smaller share this round, but I'm hoping to negotiate a better deal in the future.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share than 2000. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We can both do better than before.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is my final offer for now.
